revamp UI
Set judol result to blank when bank account check is error or bank account not found view funding amount rename wording "Number" in take over amount
26 Jun 2025 Replace TDP to survey TDP At Coy
28 Jun 2025 Remove document f556
30 July 2025 1. Remove edit if loan status canceled

formulas.name: FormatDP
formulas.expression: IF( LEN(TEXT({!DP})) > 15, LEFT(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 15) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 14, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!DP}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!DP})) > 12, LEFT(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 12) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!DP}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!DP})) > 9, LEFT(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!DP}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!DP})) > 6, LEFT(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!DP}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!DP})) > 3, LEFT(TEXT({!DP}), LEN(TEXT({!DP})) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!DP}), 3), TEXT({!DP}) ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: FormatNTFPengajuan
formulas.expression: IF( LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) > 15, LEFT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 15) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 14, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) > 12, LEFT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 12) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) > 9, LEFT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) > 6, LEFT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) > 3, LEFT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), LEN(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan})) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}), 3), TEXT({!NTFPengajuan}) ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: FormatPerkiraanHargaAsset
formulas.expression: IF( LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) > 15, LEFT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 15) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 14, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) > 12, LEFT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 12) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) > 9, LEFT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) > 6, LEFT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) > 3, LEFT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), LEN(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation})) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}), 3), TEXT({!MarketPriceEstimation}) ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: FormatTDP
formulas.expression: IF( LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) > 15, LEFT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 15) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 14, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) > 12, LEFT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 12) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 11, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) > 9, LEFT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) > 6, LEFT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), 3), IF( LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) > 3, LEFT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), LEN(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy})) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}), 3), TEXT({!funcN_TDPAtCoy}) ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: funcS_AccruedInterest_message1
formulas.expression: '<div style="background-color: #fef1dc; color: #805000; padding: 8px 16px; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; display: flex; align-items: center;"><span style="margin: auto;">⚠️ Nilai Accrued interest sebesar Rp'

formulas.name: funcS_AccruedInterest_message3
formulas.expression: '' & IF({!Get_Operation_Data.effective_date__c} > {!Get_Operation_Data.Golive_Date__c}, 'yang akan dipotong pada pencairan funding.', 'akan masuk ke prepaid angsuran pertama.') & ''

formulas.name: funcS_FundingStructure_RowDP
formulas.expression:
IF(TEXT({!Get_Operation_Data.Loan_Information__r.Product_Type__c}) == "KPR", '

DP

:

Rp.' & {!FormatDP} & ',-

' , '')

formulas.name: funcS_WarningMessage
formulas.expression:
'
⚠️ Anda harus memilih funding method
'
